text:
e="preserve">Ernie Gonzalez (February 19, 1961 – May 15, 2020) was an American professional golfer. He played on the PGA Tour in the 1980s. He won the only title of his career in 1986. He became only the third left-handed golfer to win a Tour event. He was born in San Diego, California.
Gonzalez died on May 15, 2020 in Chicago of Alzheimer's disease-related problems, aged 59.
